H0.text: Cairo and Khartoum are two of the three capital cities on the River Nile, name the third.. Kampala

H1.text: Cairo and Khartoum are two of the three capital cities on the River Nile, name the third.. Addis Ababa

H2.text: Cairo and Khartoum are two of the three capital cities on the River Nile, name the third.. Nairobi

H3.text: Cairo and Khartoum are two of the three capital cities on the River Nile, name the third.. JUBA

A4.text: Juba is the capital and largest city of South Sudan.

A5.text: The city is situated on the White Nile.
